title: Atlas Reminder
summary: Easy to use and flexible to-do list app
developerAddress:
299 Freemont St
San Francisco, CA 94105
dev.1reminder@gmail.com
description: Busy professionals such as yourself might expect a lot of tasks and events throughout life. Let this essential app help you in organizing and remembering those appointments and sessions thoughtfully! With a user-friendly interface made from the latest Material Design, you can easily list down your daily routines or upcoming events without hassle.
descriptionHTML: Busy professionals such as yourself might expect a lot of tasks and events throughout life. Let this essential app help you in organizing and remembering those appointments and sessions thoughtfully! With a user-friendly interface made from the latest Material Design, you can easily list down your daily routines or upcoming events without hassle.
comments: Multiple bugs have been reported by me, took some time until at least the most annoying got fixed
Full-screen time locked ads after snoozing. No go!
Too confusing to setup. Unclear on full scope of services available. Not intuitive.
Never buy this app.. its not working :(
Hands down, best app for making quick reminders.
Very useful and easy. Would appreciate it more if they can backup in the cloud so i can restore easily after hard reset.
